# External datasets

Place optional external datasets here (not committed).

Structure:

- `data/external/nab/` for NAB-like anomaly benchmark data
- `data/external/cmaps/` for turbofan RUL-like data
- `data/external/m5/` for hierarchy/forecasting-like data

The loaders in `src/ssp/datasets/` are intentionally lightweight wrappers.
